Package controller

Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
controller.ProjectController
public class ProjectController extends Object
A controller class that acts as a "middle man" between the view classes FacultyView, FYPCoordinatorView, StudentView and the model class Project.

It can create, update or filter Project details.

Since:
2023-04-09
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public static void createProject(String newProject, String supervisorID)
      Creates a new Project in the ProjectController.
      Parameters:
      newProject - The title of the new project.
      supervisorID - The user ID of the project creator.

    • updateProjectTitle

      public static void updateProjectTitle(int projectID, String newTitle)
      Updates the title of the project. This is when the faculty wants to change the title of their own project.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The project ID of the project to be updated.
      newTitle - The new title of the project.

    • updateProjectTitle

      public static void updateProjectTitle(int requestID, int projectID, String newTitle)
      Updates the title of the project. This is when a student requests to change the title of their allocated project.
      Parameters:
      requestID - The request ID of the request made by the student.
      projectID - The project ID of the project to be updated.
      newTitle - The new title of the project.

    • allocateProject

      public static void allocateProject(String studentID, int projectID)
      Allocates a project to a student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The user ID of the student.
      projectID - The project ID of the project that the student is requesting for.

    • transferProject

      public static void transferProject(int projectID, String senderID, String receiverID)
      Transfers a project from a supervisor to another.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The project ID of the project being transferred.
      senderID - The user ID of the supervisor requesting to transfer.
      receiverID - The user ID of the new supervisor.

    • getAllProjects

      public static ArrayList<model.Project> getAllProjects()
      Gets a list of all the projects.
      Returns:
      The list of Project objects.

    • getProjectByStatus

      public static ArrayList<model.Project> getProjectByStatus(ProjectStatus status)
      Gets a list of projects by project status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to be filtered.
      Returns:
      The list of Project objects with the corresponding status.

    • getAllProjectsTitle

      public static ArrayList<String> getAllProjectsTitle()
      Gets the titles of all the projects.
      Returns:
      The list of project titles.

    • getStudentRegisteredProject

      public static int getStudentRegisteredProject(String studentID)
      Gets the project that is allocated to a specific Student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The user ID of the student.
      Returns:
      projectID The project ID of the allocated project.

    • getSupervisorProjects

      public static ArrayList<model.Project> getSupervisorProjects(String supervisorID)
      Gets all the projects under a specific Supervisor.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - The user ID of the supervisor.
      Returns:
      The list of Project objects that corresponds to the supervisor.

    • getSupervisorProjects

      public static ArrayList<model.Project> getSupervisorProjects(String supervisorID, ProjectStatus status)
      Gets the projects under a Supervisor with the given project status.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - The user ID of the supervisor.
      status - The status of the project that is to be filtered.
      Returns:
      The list of Project objects that corresponds to the supervisor and project status.

    • getSupervisorProjectsID

      Parameters:
      supervisorID - The user ID of the supervisor.
      Returns:
      The list of projectIDs that corresponds to the supervisor.

      Parameters:
      supervisorID - The user ID of the supervisor.
      status - The status of the project that is to be filtered.
      Returns:
      The list of projectIDs that corresponds to the supervisor and project status.

    • anyApprovedProject

      public static boolean anyApprovedProject(String studentID)
      Notifies a Student if they have received a project.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The user ID of the student.
      Returns:
      true if student has received a project. Otherwise, false if the student has not received a project.

    • anyAllocatedProject

      public static boolean anyAllocatedProject(String supervisorID)
      Notifies a Faculty if their project has been allocated.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - The user ID of the supervisor.
      Returns:
      true if faculty's project has been allocated. Otherwise, false if the faculty's project was not allocated.

    • checkProjectStatus

      public static ProjectStatus checkProjectStatus(int projectID)
      Checks the current status of a project.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The project ID of the project.
      Returns:
      ProjectStatus based on the status of the project.

    • setFacultyUnavail

      public static void setFacultyUnavail(String supervisorID)
      Changes the status of a Faculty to NOTFREE and changes the status of their remaining projects to UNAVAILABLE if they are supervising 2 projects.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - The user ID of the supervisor.

    • setFacultyavail

      public static void setFacultyavail(String supervisorID)
      Changes the status of a faculty to FREE and changes the status of their remaining projects to AVAILABLE if they are supervising less than 2 projects.
      Parameters:
      supervisorID - The user ID of the supervisor.

      status - The project status to be filtered.
